quest.name: Spreading the Word
journal:
Regitt wishes to enlist your help in raising Watts's Anvil out of obscurity.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Speak to the dwarven promoter at Fort Jobb.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Making these tanks is one thing...but getting folk to actually use them is another.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Any merchant worth his salt'll be wary of some unknown, untested artisan, so we've launched a campaign to spread the name of Watts's Anvil far and wide!

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: The only problem is, I'm worried that our chosen promoter's not quite ready for the world beyond Tomra. His schedule should put him in Fort Jobb at the moment, and I'd appreciate it if you could lend him a bit of support!

dialogue.name: DWARF03919
dialogue.text: Look at this, Forename! I managed to gather me a good-sized crowd.

dialogue.name: DWARF03919
dialogue.text: When you need to grab folks' attention, the good ol' “lali hop” works just as well here as it does back home!

dialogue.name: DWARF03919
dialogue.text: Now that everyone's watching, though, I feel a bit silly dancing alone. It might help to hear a few words of encouragement...

dialogue.name: DWARF03919
dialogue.text: You feel the weight of an expectant gaze from beneath the dwarf's helmet. Maybe a heartfelt psych up is just what the promoter needs.

dialogue.name: DWARF03919
dialogue.text: I don't know if I can go through with this...

dialogue.name: DWARF03919
dialogue.text: You feel the weight of an expectant gaze from beneath the dwarf's helmet. Maybe a heartfelt psych up is just what the promoter needs.

dialogue.name: DWARF03919
dialogue.text: I, uh... No. I don't think that's going to help.

dialogue.name: DWARF03919
dialogue.text: You feel the weight of an expectant gaze from beneath the dwarf's helmet. Maybe a heartfelt psych up is just what the promoter needs.

dialogue.name: DWARF03919
dialogue.text: Aye, that's got the fire going again. Right, give me some room!

dialogue.name: DWARF03919
dialogue.text: This performance courtesy of Watts's Anvil! We forge even better than we dance!

dialogue.name: DWARF03919
dialogue.text: Thanks, Forename, I think I'm over my stage fright now. You can let Regitt know that I'll be letting everyone here know that, you know...we exist and everything.

dialogue.name: DWARF03919
dialogue.text: I'll be staying around this area for a while, making sure every single soul has heard the name of Watts's Anvil.

dialogue.name: DWARF03919
dialogue.text: Please tell Regitt the campaign is proceeding as planned!

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Welcome back! How fares the campaign?

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: ...The lali hop? What a fantastic idea! Traditionally, we'd use it to warm up on a cold morning, but it seems to be just as effective at warming up a crowd.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Maybe I'll round up a few fellows and join in the next performance. A troupe of dancing dwarves ought to turn a few heads!
